attributes.action: agree to the award of a special medal (not lapel badge) to the survivors of the Arctic Convoys in WW2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remembering the extreme conditions endured by those transporting essentiial supplies to Russia through the Arctic regions during WW2, a special campaign medal (not lapel badge) is long overdue. If Russia can award such a medal, why cannot the UK also?
